feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make ds -u skip updating if no update is needed. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1958
  • Use ${APPLICATION_NAME} instead of DockSTARTer by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1959
  • Add theming to all backtitle elements by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1960

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.09.1...v2025.07.10.1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix backtitle not showing for dialog box example. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1961

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.10.1...v2025.07.10.2
